content.raw: OK, I’ll have a look at changing things around. My main reason for patching it the way I did was to maintain backwards compatibility rather than making everyone use a new PulseBlasterDDS for a niche feature that not many will use. Your suggestion makes sense and avoids this issue, as others can keep using the regular DDS class unless they need this functionality.
